> Why do you want to log if you don't know what to log?
> Logging for the sake of logging?
> 
> Robert

Some of my coworkers want to log.

Personally I feel that logging adds no value to JUnit tests. It 
seems that many people here feel the same.

I also object using System.out.println("...") in JUnit tests. Some 
coworkers do this. Maybe they understand the nature of JUnit tests 
one time.

Please continue to tell me what you think about using logging in 
JUnit tests.
